name: boring-gemini
description: Boring: An AI-powered development support tool for autonomous reasoning, planning, and verification. MCP Server for Smithery.

scripts.test: echo 'Tests run via pytest in Docker'
scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const manifest = {name: 'boring-gemini', version: '11.2.2', type: 'mcp-server', runtime: 'container', entrypoint: ['python', '-m', 'boring.mcp.http']}; fs.writeFileSync('manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2));"

author: Boring206
